parameters.name: Entity
parameters.description: Dispatch pointer to a vertex , face , or edge entity in the part or assembly

title: IView.GetCorrespondingEntity
description: Gets the entity in this drawing view that corresponds to the specified part or assembly entity.

parameters.name: Entity
parameters.description: Dispatch pointer to a vertex , face , or edge entity in the part or assembly

returns: Corresponding entity in this drawing view; null or Nothing if none found
remarks:
Use
IModelDocExtension::GetCorrespondingEntity2
to get the part entity that corresponds to a drawing view entity.
